text: Nocardiopsis halotolerans is a halotolerant bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from salt marsh soil from the desert in Kuwait.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis halotolerans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2002
title: Nocardiopsis halotolerans
